name: photoionization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of using light to cause ions (= atoms or small groups of atoms that have an electrical charge) to be formed: If the frequency is very high, photoionisation of the atoms will take place. They used photoionization to examine the structure of the molecule.
More examplesFewer examplesThe photoionisation rates are included in the model.The ultraviolet radiation field causes the photoionization of the molecules.Photoionization was the main process that they used to generate an electrical charge.The electrons that were released as a result of photoionization had sufficient energy for further ionization to take place.
